body:
I want to check available versions of PGI compiler but ran into a problem when trying `spack versions pgi`. This issue can be reproduced on the latest commit (ac7f5a1af) with CentOS 7 and Mac.

```
$ bin/spack versions pgi
==> Error: <class 'spack.pkg.builtin.pgi.Pgi'>
```
title: Failed to run `spack versions pgi`
